title: Muri make Amateka yubuhanzi mu kirere - Urusengero rwa Orbital
heading: Muri make Amateka yubuhanzi mu kirere
intro: Kuva icyogajuru cyogukora bwa mbere icyogajuru cyakozwe mu 1957 , satelite zirenga ibihumbi icumi zazengurutse isi. Muri iki gihe gishya, abahanzi babonye uburyo bwo kwagura imyitozo kandi umwanya wo hanze wahindutse ubwoko bushya bwa canvas. Hamwe nibyo, havutse ibibazo byibanze kuri politiki yubushakashatsi bwikirere - nubwo hari byinshi bitarashyirwa ahagaragara.

leonov.text: Igishushanyo cya mbere cyakozwe mu kirere ni igishushanyo cy’izuba rirashe ku isi, cyakozwe n’ikirere cy’Uburusiya Alexei Leonov mu gihe yari mu bwato bwa Voskhod 2 mu 1965 .
leonov.caption: Igice cya mbere cyubuhanzi cyaremewe mu kirere, hamwe n'amakaramu Alexei Leonov yakundaga gushushanya. Ifoto: Inzu Ndangamurage ya Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Nyuma yimyaka itatu, Moon Museum , isahani yububiko bwa miniscule bivugwa ko yamanutse ku kwezi yanditseho abahanzi batandatu bakomeye muri Amerika muri kiriya gihe: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers na Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Igishushanyo cy'Ingoro Ndangamurage kuva mu kiganiro cyambere cya New York Times. Igikumwe gihishe igishushanyo cya Warhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Umusanzu w'ubushotoranyi bwa Warhol - hejuru ibumoso - watumye uyu mushinga uba imbogamizi kubitangazamakuru by'itumanaho icyo gihe.
moonMuseum.caption2: Ishusho New York Times yahisemo gutangaza, hamwe nubuhanzi bugaragara hepfo hamwe nigishushanyo cya Andy Warhol mugice cyo hejuru cyibumoso.

fallenAstronaut.text: Mu 1971 , igishusho gito cya aluminium ya humanoid cyitwa Fallen Astronaut cyashyizwe ku Kwezi na Apollo 15 w’icyogajuru David Scott . Umuhanzi w’umubiligi Paul Van Hoeydonck yari afite intego, hamwe niki gice, cyo kwibuka icyogajuru n’ikirere bapfuye mugutezimbere ubushakashatsi bw’ikirere.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Reba icyapa cyo kwibuka gisigaye ku kwezi ahitwa Hadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: Mu myaka ya za 1970 , Pioneer Plaques hamwe na Voyager Probes zashyizeho inzira nshya yubuhanzi mu kirere. Gutwara plaque ya aluminiyumu ya zahabu hamwe n'ubutumwa bugaragara buva ku Isi ku bindi byogajuru byose bishobora kubisanga mu gihe cya kure, bagaragaje ubuzima bw'abantu mu bintu by'ibanze.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Icyapa cya Pioneer 10 na 11, cyajyanywe mu kirere kinini mu myaka ya za 70.

dove.text: Mu 1990 , Burezili yasize ikimenyetso kuri kariya gace hamwe na DOVE / OSCAR-17 , icyogajuru cyiza cyane cyiganjemo imbaraga zubusizi. Nubwo uwayiremye atigeze yifata nk'umuhanzi, cyari igisigo cyimbitse: cyanditse amajwi y'abana basaba amahoro kandi kikanabageza ku bakunzi ba radiyo barenga ibihumbi bibiri ku isi yose, gihindura CubeSat ikora umurimo w'ubupayiniya.
dove.caption: DOVE / OSCAR-17, icyogajuru cy’ibisigo cya Berezile cyohereza amajwi y'abana amahoro, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Mu mwaka wa 2012 , umuhanzi Trevor Paglen yashyize ahagaragara "Amashusho Yanyuma" , disiki ya mikoro irimo amafoto 100 yometse ku cyogajuru cy’itumanaho cya Echostar XVI muri orbit ya geostationary. Yateguwe kugeza kumyaka miriyari yimyaka, igamije kurenga umuco wabantu nkibintu byubucukuzi bwa kera.
lastPictures.caption: Amashusho Yanyuma, disiki ya micro-etched yagenewe kurenga ikiremwamuntu, yatangijwe muri 2012.

ulises.text: Mu mwaka wa 2015 , Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Umuyoboro wo mu kirere wo muri Megizike) yashyize ahagaragara Ulises I , icyogajuru cyitwa nanosatellite cyatekerejwe nka opera igitekerezo kiyobowe n'umuhanzi Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Icyogajuru cyajyanywe kuri stratosfera kuri ballon mugihe cya Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Yagenewe guturika hafi amasaha ane no kumanuka na parashute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, opera ya satelite ikoreshwa na Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Mu 2014 ni bwo icyogajuru cya mbere cy’ubuhanzi cyashyizwe ahagaragara. Umushinga w’abatera muri kaminuza ya Tokiyo ARTSAT-1 wohereje amakuru ku isi ku isi yakoreshejwe mu buhanzi no mu guhanga umuziki.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Urwego rwabatera nibice bisigaye kwisi.
artsat.caption2: ubutumwa [SPACE x ART] - kurenga imurikagurisha rya Cosmologies ryabereye mu nzu ndangamurage yubuhanzi bugezweho Tokiyo

kac.text: Umuhanzi w'iki gihe wo muri Berezile n'Umunyamerika Eduardo Kac yagize uruhare mu buhanzi bwo mu kirere binyuze mu bufatanye na NASA na SpaceX . "Imbere ya Telesikope" ( 2017 ), yakozwe n’umuhanga mu byogajuru w’umufaransa witwa Thomas Pesquet , byavuyemo igishusho cyakozwe mu kirere mpuzamahanga .
kac.caption: Telesikopi y'imbere kuri sitasiyo mpuzamahanga y’ikirere, yaremye hamwe n’umudage w’umufaransa Thomas Pesquet, 2017.

enoch.text: Muri 2018 , CubeSat itemewe yubatswe nkumushinga wubuhanzi yatangijwe muri orbit. Yatunganijwe n’umuhanzi wibitekerezo bya bahamian Tavares Strachan , Enoki arimo ikariso ya karat-24 ya zahabu hamwe na bust y’umuderevu wa mbere w’umunyamerika w’umunyamerika, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (kwerekana igice), 2015-2017. Ⓒ Tavares Strachan, ifoto ⓒ Ingoro z'umurage / LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Muri uwo mwaka, Orbital Reflector ya Trevor Paglen nayo yatangijwe nkigishushanyo kibitse muri CubeSat idakora. Igikorwa cyari ikimenyetso cyubuhanzi kigamije guhindura uburyo tubona umwanya wacu kwisi. Ntabwo yoherejwe neza. Nubwo itigeze ifungura nkuko byateguwe, yakuruye ibiganiro byingenzi kandi itanga ibisubizo byishimiwe n’abahanga mu bumenyi bw’ikirere, abahanga, ibitangazamakuru, abarezi, abanyeshuri, ndetse n’abaturage muri rusange ku isi, byerekana ko ibihangano byatsinze bitagomba gutsinda neza mu buhanga.
orbitalReflector.caption: Gutanga Digitale ya Orbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Abandi bahanzi benshi bagize uruhare mubijyanye n'ubuhanzi bwo mu kirere, buri wese azana ibitekerezo byihariye mubushakashatsi bwabo. Imishinga izwi harimo Sarah Jane Pell umuhanga mubyogajuru ubushakashatsi bwerekana imikorere yabantu mubidukikije bikabije; Agnes Meyer-Brandis's Moon Goose Analogue umushinga usuzuma amateka yubushakashatsi bwikirere hamwe nigihe tugezemo; Porogaramu ya Nahum ya AstroArts yorohereza ubushakashatsi bwa microgravity; Igishushanyo cya Cosmic Dancer cya Arthur Woods , igishusho cya mbere cyerekanwe mu kirere kuri sitasiyo ya Mir mu 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Mu 2025 , nyuma yimyaka 4 yubushakashatsi niterambere, umuhanzi ukomoka muri Berezile Edson Pavoni nitsinda ryabantu benshi bakorana bazashyira ahagaragara Orbital Temple , icyogajuru cy’ubuhanzi cyitabira guhamagarira umuntu uwo ari we wese ku isi kohereza amazina kuri orbit, agakora urwibutso rurimo abantu benshi kurenga imipaka.
orbitalTemple.caption: Urusengero rwa Orbital kuri Bienal ya Mercosul. Ifoto: Clara Marques
